<div style="border: 1px dotted blue; background: #00CC66;padding:4px;margin-bottom:2px;">'''Note''':  This function should only be used as a low-level function for advanced users.  For typical Voice scripting, please see the [[/Resource:Voice.md|Voice Resource]]</div>
{{Needs Example}}
This function allows you to mute voices for a player.

==Syntax== 

<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setPlayerVoiceIgnoreFrom ( element thePlayer, mixed ignoreFrom )
</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/player.md|player]]:setVoiceIgnoreFrom|voiceIgnoreFrom|}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''thePlayer:''' The [[/player.md|player]] you wish to change
*'''ignoreFrom:''' Element or table of elements which the player should not hear voices from. Use ''nil'' if no one should be ignored.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the value was set successfully, ''false'' otherwise.

<section name="Server" class="server" show="true">
